page.title: 07HIGHER HARLYN CARAVAN PARK
page.content: Higher harlyn Caravan Park is owned by Mr.P.H Bennett and the site started over twentyfive years ago when there fewer holiday makers around there are more touring caravans than any thing else. They have fifty caravans which stay on the site all year around and fifty spaces for toureres and statics. Mr.P.H.Bennett employs ten to twenty people during the sumer season. the buisiest time for the site is during the sumer holidays the holidays start from 20July to end off August people come to the site from all over G.B. The site opens from Easter to 30th September.There future plans for the site are new shower blocks. The site facilities are shop ,laundrette ,bar ,childrens room ,swimming pool ,barbaqu area ,showers, and toilets.
